description: This file defines a React context provider component (NotesProvider) for managing notes, tags, and related state and actions in a note-taking application. It includes functions to fetch, create, update, and delete notes and tags, using fetch API calls to a backend server, and manages various local state variables.

methods.name: NotesProvider({ children })
methods.description: A React functional component that provides notes and tags management context to its children components.

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from the backend API, considering current search and selected tags filters.

methods.name: fetchTags
methods.description: Fetches available tags from the backend API.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Sends a request to create a new note on the backend, then refreshes the notes list.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by id on the backend, then refreshes the notes list.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by id from the backend, then refreshes the notes list.

methods.name: createTag
methods.description: Creates a new tag on the backend and updates the tags list.

methods.name: deleteTag
methods.description: Deletes a tag by ID from the backend and refreshes tags and notes.
